name: Liluweb Development Studio
description:
We are the team of Web Developers from Kharkiv | Ukraine.
Our team specializes in complex solutions for the web development (JavaScript / PHP / WordPress / WooCommerce).
We provide the following services for our clients:
✅ PHP & JS Development
✅ PSD to WordPress
✅ Development WordPress Plugins
✅ Create Custom WordPress themes
✅ Install and customize WordPress theme
✅ Work with various APIs for WordPress
✅ Make sites responsive
✅ Work with phpMyAdmin database for WordPress
✅ Fix bugs on WordPress websites, etc.
Our company was founded in 2012. We have completed over 200 projects.
We work from Monday to Friday from 9 a.m. to 7 a.m (UTC+02:00).
We will be happy to work with you!
